## Introduction
My name is [Kevin Dang](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dang-kevin/) and I am a graduate student at the University of Toronto Dalla Lana School of Public Health, pursuing a Master of Science in Biostatistics with an Emphasis in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Option. I hold a Bachelor's degree from the University of Toronto in Applied Statistics and a minor in Mathematics, conferred in Spring 2020. 

Currently, I am a Teaching Assistant for courses in the Dalla Lana School of Public Health, Department of Computer Science, and Department of Statistical Sciences. I am also working at St. Michael's Hospital for my biostatistics practicum.
